phrases: Hey all you viewers out there!
When you are watching Fairy Tail keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen, all right?
We were fighting on Galuna Island against Lyon and his gang who were scheming to resurrect Deliora,
but the great Erza came after us!
Natsu barged into the moon temple by himself and challenged Lyon.
That is right, we can do it!
Let us go for even more who-knows-what!!
The door to mystery is right in front of us
This excitement gets my heart racing
Why cannot I see tomorrow, I wonder?
The only part leveling up is my curiosity
We cannot just throw away our daily life together, right?
Living itself will be our training!
Let us search for even more who-knows-what!
We cannot be satisfied with just the normal answers
We will do our best living our life
The city where I lived was attacked by Deliora.
It did not even take a day for it to be destroyed.
I would heard the rumors, but I would have never imagined...
I was saved by Ul and Lyon who just happened to pass by.
Deliora... I will not forgive you...
And for me, that is how it all started.
Gray, sure you can keep up?
My training is harsh, you know.
As long as I can get the power to defeat Deliora, I will do anything!
I am ready for you anytime!
You have got to be kidding me!
You think I would strip in this snow?
All I got to do is strip, right?
If you are going to control the cold, then you need to become one with the cold.
I am t-totally used it already.
I am doing the basics, too.
Among the many magics, Creation Magic is the magic with the greatest freedom...
Each individual's Creation Magic is unique.
And search out your own form...
Hey, do not you have an extra pupil there?
He is a rebel and quite the handful.
And the other one is named Lyon, right?
Both of them seem like they will be future hunks.
When they grow up, let me have one,'kay?
Their constant noise is driving me nuts.
You look like you have got children, so no man'll come near you.
I do not need any love advice, thanks.
You are not getting any younger, Ul...
Should not you be thinking about your own happiness a bit?
How long do you think until we get better than Ul?
My dream is to beat her one day.
If I have told you once, I have told you a thousand times, I do not care.
And you are too cheerful and keep blabbing on about Ul all the time.
She told me that the reason she accepted you as her pupil was that you were wrapped in darkness.
After seeing what I saw, how could I be not be?
She said she wanted to drive away the darkness.
As long as I defeat Deliora, that is good enough for me.
The minute I get the power, I will say sayonara to that ice queen!
What did you call your teacher?!
When are you going to teach me some powerful magic?
It is no use at all.
Creation Magic is the magic with the greatest freedom.
When you find your own form, it can be as powerful as you want.
You are just saying the same old stuff.
It is all your fault I have this weird habit!
So, did you hear about Deliora?
They say it is moved to the Northern Continent.
Then peace has returned to Isvan?
There is no way you can win against Deliora!
It is impossible for you, Gray.
I am going to avenge my mother and father!
You got a problem with that?!
You leave, and you are expelled.
If I die, then I will haunt you for not teaching me more powerful magic.
Not sure how he did it, but only he would do something nuts like that.
It does not really matter whether he did it on purpose or not.
Now the light of the moon will not shine on Deliora.
Who knew that his tendency for wanton destruction could actually come in handy?
We have found you, Fairy Tail!
We will not allow you to interfere with Reitei-sama!
We are here, too, so just go!
He does not know that Ul is still alive.
The only one who can stop him...
Damn... I did not think it would be this strong...
Just take Lyon away from here.
It is harder to fight when I have to protect you, too.
He is out for the count.
I was not... able to do anything...
A good friend of mine told me that I should start thinking about my own happiness.
But I do not remember being all that unhappy.
With my two bright pupils growing day by day...
That is all the happiness I need.
I came here to take back that happiness.
I lost it, but it is no big deal.
Creation Magic is pretty amazing, do not you think?
If that monster is your darkness, then I have a reason to fight it.
This is just a hurdle to pass to take back my happiness.
You are really going to do it?
Ul, you are the strongest wizard there is...
There is no way you would lose to some monster, right?
Lyon, I have told you before.
There are a ton of wizards stronger than me in the countries to the west.
If you are not then... why did I go through all that training?
After you surpass me, then you should just find a new goal.
I became your pupil because I thought you were the strongest!
Do not you dare lose to that monster!
If you are not going to be serious, then I will do it!
Because you would not teach me any powerful magic, I had to read the spell books in your storehouse!
Why did you hide such powerful magic from me?
Did you read that book to the end?
The people who use that magic...
No magic will work against Deliora...
In that case, I will use this magic to trap you for eternity in ice!
I cannot let you use that magic.
He cannot use Iced She Will!
The people who use it destroy their own bodies.
But it is true that is the only thing that could stop this thing.
I cannot believe that Lyon would think of trying the same thing I was going to do.
That is a disciple for you.
I will not allow you to get near my pupils!
This is the end for you, monster!
It is magic that turns one's own body into ice...
Gray, I have a favor to ask you.
If he knew that I became the ice, he would probably spend his entire life trying to undo the spell.
If he did that, that would defeat the purpose.
I want Lyon to see more of the world...
Please, I will do whatever you say from now on!
I will live on as the ice, for all eternity...
Ul gave her life to drive away my days of darkness.
With those words in my heart, I decided to start on a new path.
How am I supposed to surpass Ul now?!
If it were not for you...
If you had not challenged Deliora...
Damn, there is no end to this.
Just give it up and surrender already, you pointy-eyed bastard!
Your eyes are pretty pointy themselves.
I like the sound of that.
Natsu, let me take this guy down.
You already lost to him once, remember?
That is some confidence you have there.
It was my fault that Ul died ten years ago.
I cannot forgive you for that.
I will punish you for them all, Lyon.
Ul cast the Iced She Will magic on this demon.
It is a demon that Ul risked her life to seal away.
You bastard... have you gone mad?
Return the villagers to the way they were,
take your friends and leave this island immediately!
This is the last chance I will give you.
You think you can bluff me with that magic?
No matter how many years pass, it will not change the fact that it is my fault Ul's dead!
I have to take responsibility sometime...
I have been for the past 10 years!
Do we die together or live together?
You do not have the guts to die.
There is no way you do!
Natsu, Erza, everyone at Fairy Tail...
It is up to you now...
Sorry, but I am making my exit!
chasing after your profile left only in my revolving dreams
You said, I never want to see your face again, when you left me
But the tears on your cheek said it all
Every time you felt like you would be swallowed up in the waves of contradiction
you always held back your tears, you know?
What a strong person, they said, but everyone overestimated you
and before you knew it you lost sight of who you really are
Then the sun I thought would always be near me collapsed
Rubbing out the truths and the lies of one day, altogether
still, ironically, chasing after your profile in my revolving dreams
Today we will be teaching you the secrets of the Ice Wizard, Gray!
Gray uses Ice Creation Magic, and is always fighting with the fire-using Natsu.
But they are actually quite similar.
Gray gets lots of points for stripping off pretty much any clothing anywhere.
He seems to have a weakness for women's tears, though.
You and Gray have always fought, right?
Well I am not going to lose to him, that is for sure!
Which one of you is stronger?
I am way stronger than that icey bastard, obviously.
Gray said pretty much the same thing.
Next time: Galuna Island, the Final Battle!
So, who do you think is stronger, Happy?
Anyway, it looks like Deliora is about to be resurrected!
You are just trying to dodge the question!
